QuestData.Title: While We're in the Neighborhood
QuestData.Description: Ogres from the empire are known for being cold and calculating.$B$BWe are fortunate that their calculations are rarely spot on.$B$BMorkurk has been using enchanted bracelets to empower his minions with arcane strength.$B$BSince we're going to have to dispatch them anyways, we might as well get some reagents out of it.
